H0.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Fiat

H1.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Renault

H2.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Peugeot

H3.text: Which other car company owns Seat. VW

A4.text: Volkswagen AG took over the full ownership of SEAT in 1990.

A5.text: Volkswagen AG acquired a controlling stake in SEAT in 1986, making it the first non-German subsidiary of the Volkswagen Group.
